Package edu.gtu.Expression

Class ExpressionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gtu.Expression.BinaryTree<java.lang.String>
      • edu.gtu.Expression.ExpressionTree
  • public class ExpressionTree
extends BinaryTree<java.lang.String>
    Class which represent tree from given prefix and postfix expression.

        private static java.lang.String[] ensureExtraCapacity​(java.lang.String[] convertArr,
                                                      int used)
        Ensure extra capacity of given String array capacity .
        Parameters:
        convertArr - Array that will be ensured.
        used - used index amount of given array.
        Returns:
        Depending on status of the given array , may return a newly created array or given array itself.

      • eval

        private int eval​(BinaryTree.Node<java.lang.String> node,
                 int result)
        Evaluate constructed tree , return result.

        Evaluating has done by post order traversing , because for evaluation we need to reach the end of the tree which is the most subchild node or nodes.

        Parameters:
        node - Start node of evaluation.
        result - Avtual result of evaluation.
        Returns:
        result of evaluation of current tree.

      • makeOperation

        private int makeOperation​(java.lang.String operator,
                          int left,
                          int right)
        Make an operation and return the result of it.
        Parameters:
        operator - Operator that will be applied on operands as String.
        left - A left operand.
        right - A right operand.
        Returns:
        Evaluation result of given operator and operands.

      • postOrderTraverse

        protected void postOrderTraverse​(BinaryTree.Node<java.lang.String> node,
                                 java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
        Create and StringBuilder formed according to post order traversing.

        It is postorder traversing method , firstly we go through the end of the tree and then perform the task for each node.

        Parameters:
        node - Start node of traversing.
        sb - StringBuilder that will be constructed.

      • readBinaryTree

        public static ExpressionTree readBinaryTree​(java.util.Scanner scan)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Newly built ExpressionTree of given expression as scanner.
